resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: [Rust] Activate generate_decimal256_case arrow integration test for rust

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
viirya opened a new pull request, #13219:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13219

   arrow-rs has fixed severals integration test failures:
   
   generate_decimal128_case
   generate_interval_case
   generate_map_case
   generate_non_canonical_map_case
   generate_nested_large_offsets_case
   generate_nested_dictionary_case
   generate_unions_case
   
   And this one passes test without any fix:
   generate_extension_case
   
   We should activate these IPC integration tests for rust.

github-actions[bot] commented on PR #13219:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13219#issuecomment-1135165497

   https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16636

github-actions[bot] commented on PR #13219:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13219#issuecomment-1135165516

   :warning: Ticket **has no components in JIRA**, make sure you assign one.

github-actions[bot] commented on PR #13219:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13219#issuecomment-1135165525

   :warning: Ticket **has not been started in JIRA**, please click 'Start Progress'.

viirya commented on PR #13219:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13219#issuecomment-1135175310

   cc @alamb

viirya commented on PR #13219:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13219#issuecomment-1135232824

   Hmm, I ran `archery integration --with-cpp=true --with-rust=true` locally without any issue. I'll look into the difference.

alamb commented on PR #13219:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13219#issuecomment-1135942612

   This is epic

viirya commented on PR #13219:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13219#issuecomment-1140183598

   I'm in business trip this week. I will have more time to look into this in next week.

viirya commented on PR #13219:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13219#issuecomment-1141617526

   Regarding the failure `FAILED TEST: decimal Rust producing,  Rust consuming`, it is because Rust performs a decimal check that C++ doesn't. And in the golden file `0.14.1_decimal.gold.json`, there are some values failing this check. I can conform that the test can be passed if removing the check in Rust side.
   
   I propose a quick fix at Rust side to remove it, just following C++ Arrow decimal builder.

viirya commented on PR #13219:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13219#issuecomment-1146337163

   Yea, `FAILED TEST: decimal Rust producing,  Rust consuming` was fixed now. Continuing looking into remaining two failed cases.

viirya commented on PR #13219:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13219#issuecomment-1146701134

   For `FAILED TEST: union Rust producing,  Rust consuming`, proposed the fix at https://github.com/apache/arrow-rs/pull/1789

alamb commented on PR #13219:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13219#issuecomment-1151582611

   Amazing work @viirya  ❤️

alamb commented on PR #13219:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13219#issuecomment-1151583578

   The arrow repo used to have a different way of merging PRs (using a script)

alamb commented on PR #13219:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13219#issuecomment-1152895907

   Looking into it

alamb commented on PR #13219:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13219#issuecomment-1152896191

   Following the process in https://github.com/apache/arrow/tree/master/dev

alamb merged PR #13219:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13219

alamb commented on PR #13219:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13219#issuecomment-1152896737

   Thanks again @viirya

viirya commented on PR #13219:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13219#issuecomment-1152960117

   Thank you @alamb

issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description:
arrow-rs has fixed severals integration test failures:

generate_decimal128_case
generate_interval_case
generate_map_case
generate_non_canonical_map_case
generate_nested_large_offsets_case
generate_nested_dictionary_case
generate_unions_case

And this one passes test without any fix:
generate_extension_case

We should activate these IPC integration tests for rust.
fields.summary: [Rust] Activate several IPC integration tests for rust
